definition: Yangming district of Mudanjiang city 牡丹江市, Heilongjiang
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
Wang Yangming (1472-1529), Ming dynasty Neo-Confucian philosopher, influential in the School of Mind 心學|心学[xin1 xue2]
Mt Yangming in Hunan/Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
Yangming district of Mudanjiang city 牡丹江市, Heilongjiang

sentences.english: He is a student in YangMing Elementary School.
Yeah, do you know what type of people often come to visit Yangmingshan these days?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，你猜現在經常來陽明山的是哪些人？

sentences.english: No wonder. Last time when I went to Yangmingshan National Park, there was a smell of sulphur in an area.
sentences.chinese: 難怪我上次去陽明山國家公園時，聞到一股硫磺味。

sentences.english: We will picnic in mountain of Yangming.
The highest good theory of Master Yangming belongs to the human nature theory of Confucian school.
sentences.chinese: 陽明子的至善論本來屬於儒家人性論的話題。

sentences.english: Lily:You just want to save money. We always go to Yangmingshan. I am so bored of it.
sentences.chinese: 你就是不想花錢，每次都去陽明山，我都看膩了。

sentences.english: Last Sunday I went to Yang Ming Shan Park with my parents.
sentences.chinese: 上週日我和我的父母去陽明山公園。

sentences.english: Doris:There is snow on Yangmingshan. Let's go visit the mountain together.
sentences.chinese: 陽明山下雪了耶，我們一起上山去看好不好。

sentences.english: This is one of the most interesting sight during the early summer in the …
sentences.chinese: 這是陽明山區初夏的溪流中有趣的景觀。

sentences.english: Under the influence of the school of mind, he was both successful and unsuccessful.
sentences.chinese: 在陽明心學思想影響下，他有得有失。

sentences.english: Correlation between the Foot Yangming Channel and stomach has relative specificity.
sentences.chinese: 足陽明經與胃相關具有相對特異性。

sentences.english: The relation between reason and mind is the core issue of Wangyangming's philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 心與理的關係是王陽明哲學的核心問題。

sentences.english: This paper also mentions the modern significance of Wang's Conscience Theory.
sentences.chinese: 文章還提及了陽明良知說的現代意義。

sentences.english: Yang-ming's Theory is literati's supporting point with which they doubt and criticize the reality.
sentences.chinese: 陽明心學爲文人作家懷疑和批判現實提供了精神支點。

sentences.english: We will take a trip to Yangmingshan on the eighth of April.
sentences.chinese: 四月八日我們要去陽明山旅行。

sentences.english: Night Yang who spy on misty rain over the wall, at the same time the misty rain guess fixed identity.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚陽明君翻牆偷看煙雨，同時煙雨猜出世子身份。

definition: excess of yang 陽|阳[yang2] in TCM
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
nine orifices of the human body (eyes, nostrils, ears, mouth, urethra, anus)
